VA Family Leave Act of 2020

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
VA Family Leave Act of 2020
This bill provides employees of the Veterans Health Administration with the same family and medical leave benefits as other federal employees, beginning in FY2021.
